snippet.title: Grood - On Steam - Teaser
snippet.description:
Grood is an indie arcade Shoot 'em up that'll make you fight thousands of killing robots through woods, swamps, cities, deserts and every type of weather condition, during the day and at night. Tear apart the machines and their final bosses to make your way to your final goal... and to the top of the global leaderboard!
Have a look on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/793630/GROOD/
